dfdfe689-6867-430d-bbcf-106b9e7ed4f6.content:
General First Aid In the Workplace


Wouldn't we all be better off if we knew what to do?


People often avoid first aid training, fearing the responsibility of being a designated First Aider in the work place. But...regardless of preference, knowledge, or capability, sometimes circumstances mean you are in a position where someone needs your help. Suddenly, when it is a case of saving the life of the person next to you in the lift, all the above excuses seem unimportant.

1e080dbf-0316-4548-be29-4504464950db.content: Wouldn't we all be better off if we knew what to do? Of course we would, so let's learn.
